reviewText: O curso  é meio confuso, não explica muito na prática. Além disso, prometeram certificado com carga horaria de 12 horas e não veio no certificado enganação.

The course is comprehensive enough to provide an insight to international arbitration. It covers significant provisions of the governing statutes, substantiated by case laws. The faculty for the course has worked well in terms of articulation and quality of course material. A highly recommended course.

It was a wonderfully crafted course on International arbitration, but i had to gone through some difficulties to access forum and assignments via mobile phone.

The course helps to understand the mechanism of international arbitration, mainly its institutions, the applicable law, and the famous awards rendered by arbitrators. From the Permanent Court of Arbitration in the Hague, disputes relating to the Law of the Sea, ICSID's disputes, and the enforcement of arbitral awards. The course also provides an analysis of famous awards:1. South China Sea Arbitration (the People's Republic of China vs the Republic of the Philippines).2. Yukos Arbitration (Yukos Universal Limited - Isle of Man vs Russian Federation).3. Artic Sunrise Case (Kingdom of the Netherlands vs Russian Federation).

A complete outlook of the history, mechanisms, institutions, and organizations involved in the peaceful settlement of international disputes concerning diverse matters such as maritime disputes, investment disputes, commercial disputes, etc. A pool of references to leading cases, relevant regulation and proper bibliography makes this course a perfect stage to learn and apply knowledge concerning settlement of international disputes. I have nothing more than thankul words for the organisers and to Leiden Universiteit.
